alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Botetourt (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alleghany and central Botetourt Counties in west central Virginia through 530 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fincastle, or 7 miles southeast of Oriskany, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clifton Forge... Eagle Rock... Fincastle... Nace... Low Moor... Springwood... and Glen Wilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
